name: unsurprised
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not surprised: unsurprised to If you've used this textbook, you'll be unsurprised to learn that the author is a teacher.unsurprised at She seemed unsurprised at his somewhat irrational behaviour.unsurprised that Based on his previous record, we were unsurprised that the marketing director hadn't turned up for the meeting. I was unsurprised by the negative comments of her teachers.
More examplesFewer examplesShe had rather liked his wife, but she was unsurprised when the marriage ended.We were unsurprised to learn that the energy companies were making so much profit.
